Description: Ostracon, small fragment of the body of a red-brown pottery vessel, the fabric is partially grey in section, exterior covered with remains of two lines of Coptic text written in black ink.
Curator's comments: To be published by J. Cromwell
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393212) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393212)
